about_the_game:
Mysteryville is a classic Hidden Object game that charges you with the task of finding required items buried in various chaotic locations.
Mysterious puzzles, hidden object searches, and a funny adventure are waiting for you!

Something very strange is going on in the town of Mysteryville and as the ace reporter for Countryside Life Magazine, it's up to you to learn the truth!
As you question the strange local townspeople to collect information for your article it doesn’t take long for you to discover that something isn’t quite right in this charming little town… as well as, just how dangerous being a journalist can be.
Your seemingly simple assignment unfolds into a full-blown adventure as you try to learn the secret of the Black Lotus and its ancient prophecy.

Discover new possibilities as you untangle the mystery's tricky plots and solve all of the game’s Puzzles!
Go through 21 locations, interview the town’s residents, figure out their clues and find all the evidence that you need to solve the mystery of the vanishing cats.
With hours of hide-and-seek fun, bizarre characters, and incredible graphics, Mysteryville is a surprising experience for all your senses.

This mysterious crime story and classic hidden object game will be appreciated by cats and kitten lovers.

Features:
- Exciting Hidden Object game - try to find all the clues!
- Mysterious gameplay
- Detective crime story
- Over 20 of different locations
- Gripping soundtrack

Only a true detective can find the missing felines!
